textboxes.description: The time has come. After months of preparations and skirmishes, the final assault to reclaim Em-Land is about to begin. The goblins, wild-eyed and eager for chaos, line up behind you, their battle cries echoing through the forest as they prepare to charge. Bubba is by your side, his expression grim. The Soviets are entrenched, but their morale has been weakened by your prior successes. You know this is your best chance to strike, but the Soviets will be desperate to hold onto Em-Land. The battle will be fierce, and every move counts.

choices.text: Lead the goblins in a frontal assault to catch the Soviets off guard.
Use a decoy to lure the Soviets into an ambush set by the goblins.
Sneak into the Soviet camp under the cover of darkness and sabotage their communications.

textboxes.description: You order the goblins to charge forward, leading them through the dense woods toward the Soviet encampment. The goblins are ecstatic, their chaotic battle tactics catching the Soviets completely by surprise. However, as the battle intensifies, you see Soviet reinforcements arriving from the east. The Soviet forces are more prepared than you expected, and the situation is growing increasingly dangerous. You have to decide whether to push forward or retreat and regroup.

choices.text: Push forward with the goblins, determined to break through the Soviet lines.
Order a strategic retreat to avoid unnecessary casualties and plan a new attack.

textboxes.description: Using the cover of the trees, you set up a decoy—a group of goblins disguised as soldiers. They begin marching towards the Soviet lines, drawing the attention of the Soviets who believe it’s a large force. As the Soviets chase the decoy, you lead the real goblin force around their flank, launching a surprise ambush. The Soviets are caught off guard, but their commanders are quickly organizing a counterattack. The battle is far from over.

choices.text: Engage the Soviet commanders directly to disrupt their leadership.
Lead the goblins deeper into Soviet territory to sow chaos and confuse them further.

textboxes.description: You and a small team of goblins slip past the Soviet lines under cover of night. The Soviets are distracted by the chaos of the battle, making it easier for you to sneak into their camp. Once inside, you sabotage their communications equipment, cutting them off from their reinforcements. The Soviets are in disarray, but their response is swift—soon, they’re sending their best soldiers to hunt you down. You need to leave the camp quickly.

choices.text: Fight your way out of the camp to rejoin the goblins and continue the assault.
Use the chaos to escape quietly and regroup with Bubba to plan the next phase.

textboxes.description: The goblins push forward, but Soviet forces are pushing back harder than you expected. The battle grows chaotic as goblins and soldiers clash in a storm of weapons and magic. Your forces are growing thin, and the Soviets are beginning to reinforce their position. Bubba looks at you, determination in his eyes. The goblins are starting to waver, and you need to make a call quickly before it all falls apart.

choices.text: Use a powerful magical item to break through the Soviet lines and lead the charge.
Tell the goblins to fight on the flanks and create a distraction while you cut through the center.

textboxes.description: You order a retreat, but it’s not without cost. The Soviets press hard, and the goblins are slower to pull back than you’d hoped. You manage to escape with minimal casualties, but the Soviets are closing in fast. You need to regroup, or you risk losing everything.

choices.text: Regroup with your remaining forces and attempt a new approach, focusing on sabotage and guerilla tactics.
Regroup in the forests and wait for reinforcements before attacking again.

textboxes.description: You charge straight into the Soviet command center, breaking through their lines. Soviet commanders are thrown into disarray, and without leadership, their soldiers falter. The Soviets are now less coordinated, and you have a brief opportunity to strike at their vulnerable points. However, the commanders are regrouping, and time is running out.

choices.text: Push the advantage and finish off the remaining commanders before they can regroup.
Take advantage of the confusion and lead the goblins to capture a key Soviet stronghold.

textboxes.description: The Soviets are caught off guard by the ambush, but soon begin organizing a counterattack. The goblins take advantage of their disarray, sowing chaos across their ranks. However, the Soviet forces are strong and quickly rallying. You know this fight can still be won, but you’ll need to act quickly to break the Soviet resolve.

choices.text: Lead a direct attack on the Soviet supply lines to cripple their reinforcements.
Focus on spreading misinformation among Soviet ranks to sow confusion and distrust.

textboxes.description: Fighting your way out of the Soviet camp is no easy task. You slice through soldiers with precision, but there’s no time to catch your breath. The Soviets are hot on your heels, and the longer you stay, the more dangerous it becomes. You need to escape, but getting caught is inevitable unless you think fast.

choices.text: Use a teleportation scroll to escape the camp and return to the front lines.
Fight your way out and create a distraction to allow the goblins to advance without interference.

textboxes.description: You manage to escape the camp, but you’re alone now. You quickly regroup with Bubba, who’s been waiting for you. The Soviets are closing in, and you need a new strategy if you’re going to turn this around. You can’t afford another mistake.

choices.text: Use the confusion to launch a surprise attack on the Soviet rear guard.
Regroup with the goblins and focus on securing a defensive position until reinforcements arrive.
